response.original_title: The Friendliest and Funniest Fish in the Sea
response.overview: Have you ever hugged a shark?... smooched a Stingray?... or groped a Grouper? Those are the kinds of hilarious antics you will experience in this amazing film by award winning underwater filmmaker George Monteiro. Enjoyed by kids on Nickelodeon and adults on the Travel Channel, this is a program the whole family will love. You'll never fear the creatures of the sea once you get to know them.
response.title: The Friendliest and Funniest Fish in the Sea
